segments.text: What's the weather like in Britain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's wet and rains a lot.But right now it's the golden season to take a tour there . It is fine there almost everyday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . Will I feel hot there ? I feel sensitive to heat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not so hot as it is here .
segments.speaker: S2
